article.headline: Utah Valley State 75, Northern Colorado 61
article.story: GREELEY, Colo. (AP) -- Chris Bailey had 15 points and three assists and David Heck added 14 points as Utah Valley State assured itself a winning season with a 75-61 victory over Northern Colorado Saturday night. Pierre Thomas had 12 points for Utah Valley State (15-13), which has one game remaining at Longwood on March 4. The Wolverines won the earlier meeting against Northern Colorado, 71-65, on Jan. 21 and have never lost to Northern Colorado in eight meetings. Sean Taibi led Northern Colorado (5-24) with 16 points. Kirk Archibeque had 14 points and 10 rebounds for the Bears, who played their last game as an independent and begin play in the Big Sky Conference in 2006-07. Archibeque converted 1-of-2 free throws to get Northern Colorado within a point of the Wolverines 12 seconds into the second half, but the Bears never got closer. Richard Troyer and Thomas keyed a keyed a 10-0 run with a 3-pointer each to put Utah Valley up 52-39 with 11:32 left. The lead for Utah Valley State was 62-44 after two layups by Sylvester Allison. Allison had five points over the final four minutes and Northern Colorado was never able to get the lead under 13 points the rest of the way. Utah Valley led 31-29 at the half, building a 15-7 lead off a 7-0 run and were ahead 24-15 with 8:31 remaining after a 15-foot jumper by Richard Troyer. The Wolverines withstood an 8-0 run capped by Taibi's 3-pointer that got the Bears as close as 24-23.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
